author: pedro
msg: And if we want to navigate to some other page mapped by PageInstanceMapper
the current location.replace('page?{id}') works fine, but only for IE9.
In IE 6, 7 and 8 it works only with the full page path after the filter one.

author: kkolinko
msg: The history of the fix for CVE-2011-2481 was a bit more complicated. Add missed revision number.
Add new tag <revlink> as a more simple markup for links to svn revisions.
